reuters.title: CONCEPT INC <CCPT> 2ND QTR FEB 28 NET
reuters.body: Shr 11 cts vs five cts Net 656,000 vs 314,000 Sales 8,868,000 vs 6,499,000 Avg shrs 5,823,000 vs 5,705,000 1st half Shr 22 cts vs 13 cts Net 1,296,000 vs 795,000 Sales 17.3 mln vs 13.5 mln Avg shrs 5,809,000 vs 5,973,000 NOTE: Share adjusted for five-for-four split in February 1987. Reuter 
